title.narrative: Madagascar: Aide ciblée aux pays
Madagascar: Targeted country assistance

description.narrative:
L’assistance technique est un soutien non financier fourni par des spécialistes. Elle peut revêtir plusieurs formes : partage d’information et de savoir-faire, formation et services-conseils.
L’assistance technique fournie dans le cadre du PEF est appelée aide ciblée aux pays. Ce type de soutien vise principalement à payer le personnel basé en permanence dans les bureaux pays des partenaires. Il repose sur la demande et les besoins identifiés par les pays eux-mêmes.

Technical assistance is non-financial support provided by specialists. It can take the form of sharing information and expertise, training and consulting services.
The technical assistance provided through PEF is called targeted country assistance (TCA). This type of support mainly consists of staff permanently based in partners’ country offices. It is based on the demand and needs identified by the countries themselves.

Cette activité détaille notre travail sur le Aide ciblée aux pays en Madagascar, grâce à la mise à disposition des données budgétaires et des transactions. Nous fournissons également les documents pertinents qui guident ces activités que sont les formulaires de demande de soutien fournis par le gouvernement de Madagascar ainsi que les lettres de décisions émises par Gavi, pour progresser. Ces documents décrivent les activités, les objectifs ainsi que les bénéficiaires.

This activity details our work on Targeted country assistance in Madagascar through the provision of budget and transaction data. We also provide the relevant documents that guide these activities, which are the support request proposal(s) provided by the Government of Madagascar, as well as the decision letter(s) issued by Gavi, for progress. These documents describe the activities, the objectives as well as the beneficiaries.

title.narrative: UNICEF : Programme Management - Financial Management

# All amount due to procurment of vaccines paid by end of 2020 # Situation repport on 2021 cofinancing status shared with MPH # In case of delay, reminder letter from UNICEF senior management to MPH
# GAVI Grant managed by UNICEF financial report is submitted to the ICC # HACT Training and Financial Capacity building done for UNICEF and MPH (national / regional / district) staffs
# vaccines forecasting / procurement costing included in the Health Sector Development Plan

target.value: # Keep abreast of national budget commitment / expenditure and provide timely information to UNICEF Senior Management for advocacy to MPH for cofinancing and traditional vaccine procurement # Ensure Funds are managed in a transparent and accountable manner: @ Support the partner in reviewing requests prior to submisison to UNICEF to avoid discrepancies between planning, forecasting and funding allocated; @ Support the patner in reviewing expenditure supporting documents and reports # In collaboration with Program manager, support national /region/ district capacity building to ensure appropriate funding utilization and project execution

# Keep abreast of national budget commitment / expenditure and provide timely information to UNICEF Senior Management for advocacy to MPH for cofinancing and traditional vaccine procurement # Ensure Funds are managed in a transparent and accountable manner: @ Support the partner in reviewing requests prior to submisison to UNICEF to avoid discrepancies between planning, forecasting and funding allocated; @ Support the patner in reviewing expenditure supporting documents and reports # In collaboration with Program manager, support national /region/ district capacity building to ensure appropriate funding utilization and project execution

title.narrative: Dalberg Global Development Advisors

The various comments received on the manual of procedures will be integrated to finalize the document. The MP will support the EPI team in the implementation of new procedures. He/She will propose amendments of the EPI?s manual of procedures to improve the program?s effectiveness.

target.value: Support the organizational improvement of the EPI by developing a manual of procedures. The manual of procedures will codify strategic objectives and program management procedures and will play a pivotal role in ensuring the efficiency and effectiveness of the teams.

title.narrative: CDC : Health Information Systems (Data)
Complete end-of-ISDS transition activity review to report on the sustainability of ISDS activities in the5 implementation regions

target.value: Completion of STOP Immunisation and Surveillance Data Specialist (ISDS) pilot and transition to ensure sustainable improvements in immunization and VPD surveillance data management, quality and use through sustained supportive supervision

target.value: Completion of STOP Immunisation and Surveillance Data Specialist (ISDS) pilot and transition to ensure sustainable improvements in immunization and VPD surveillance data management, quality and use through sustained supportive supervision

title.narrative: Complete end-of-phase 4 review meeting to report on results from the second year of STOP ISDS pilot implementation in 5 regions; Complete first round of summative assessment of pilot implementation in Madagascar

target.value: STOP Immunisation and Surveillance Data Specialist (ISDS) pilot to improve immunization and VPD surveillance data management, quality and use

title.narrative: UNICEF : Service Delivery
Service delivery related barriers of missed communities to access immunisation services identified and prioritized

target.value: # Appui au renforcement de la vaccination de routine y compris le rattrapage des zero-doses/enfants des communautes negligees, la mise en oeuvre de l'ACC dans les 8 grandes villes et l'introduction du VPI2 Activites: (i) Appuyer l'elaboration du plan de rattrapage des enfants « zéro dose » ainsi que ceux des communautés négligées; (ii) Soutenir la mise en oeuvre de l'approche urbaine dans 5 Villes (Tana, Fianarantsoa I, Majunga I, Antsirabe I, Tulear I) et l'extension dans 3 autres Villes (Toamasina I, Diego I, Ambositra I); (iii) Soutenir les preparatifs et la mise en oeuvre de qualite de la campagne de suivi rougeole integree a la supplementation en Vitamine A; (iv) Appuyer la revision des outils de microplanification et la tenue des ateliers de microplanification dans les districts prioritaires identifies par l'analyse de l'equite; (v) Soutenir la mise en oeuvre des microplans des districts prioritaires; (vi) Documenter la mise en oeuvre des microplans

title.narrative: UNICEF : Supply chain

% of target sites (provinces/districts) that have updated CCE management documents like CCE inventory, Operational Deployment Plan (ODP) or Cold Chain Expansion and Rehabilitation Plan, CCE maintenance strategy etc.)

target.value: Appuyer la disponibilite des vaccins de qualite jusqu'au dernier kilometre: Activites: (i) Soutenir le processus complet d'approvisionnement en intrants de vaccination pour la routine et les campagnes; (ii) Appuyer la mise en ?uvre de la 2e phase du CCEOP1 y compris le PII; (iii) Appuyer l'elaboration du plan de mise en oeuvre du nouveau design de la Chaine d'Approvisionnement integrée y compris l'integrant des besoins dans le Full portefolio planning; (iv) Soutenir la realisation de la cartographie des chambres froides au niveau central et dans les regions ciblees

title.narrative: UNICEF : Financial/General Management
Accounting/financial management system delivered and operational

target.value: Appuyer la gestion transparente et efficace des financements de la vaccination: Activites: (i) Renforcer les capacités au niveau national / régional / district a la formulation des requetes de financement, a leur utilisation appropriée et leur justification; (ii) Faire le suivi des transfert des fonds et leur liquidation conformement aux procedures HACT

title.narrative: UNICEF : Health Financing/Sustainability
Advocacy strategy to increase domestic political will and government funding for immunisation developed/implemented

target.value: Appuyer la preparation/mise en oeuvre d'une strategie de plaidoyer pour accroitre la volonte politique et le financement public de la vaccination

title.narrative: WHO : Data
Routine immunisation coverage survey (national /targeted - various methods) implemented

target.value: Contribute to the promotion of the use of high quality data for better decision making. Support the implementation of the data quality improvement plan at national level Support data analysis and monitoring of the country's EPI performance at national and regional levels and provide regular feedback Support the regional and districts in the application of self-assessment tools for data quality (DQS, ...), follow-up of the implementation of correction plans and in the use of new technologies to improve the quality of the data. Support the implementation of the National Coverage Survey " Support the functionality of the DHIS2 in general and the use of the WHO applications on analysis and data quality

title.narrative: UNICEF : Demand Promotion & ACSM

# Implement community awareness, active research and referral of lost children.
# Implement the training sessions on community activity packages in all the priority districts and urban areas

target.value:
# Support demand generation activities to recover lost and unvaccinated children in identified districts.
# Technical support for the development of the training documents on the community activities package and for the implementation in priority districts
# Support development of communication plan for MCV2 introduction
# Technical support for the update of the national communication plan on EPI

# Support demand generation activities to recover lost and unvaccinated children in identified districts.
# Technical support for the development of the training documents on the community activities package and for the implementation in priority districts
# Support development of communication plan for MCV2 introduction
# Technical support for the update of the national communication plan on EPI

title.narrative: # Implement community awareness, active research and referral of lost children. # Implement the training sessions on community activity packages in all the priority districts and urban areas

target.value: # Support demand generation activities to recover lost and unvaccinated children in identified districts. # Technical support for the development of the training documents on the community activities package and for the implementation in priority districts # Support development of communication plan for MCV2 introduction # Technical support for the update of the national communication plan on EPI

title.narrative: Communication and social mobilization strategy developed

target.value: Renforcer l?utilisation de service de soins à travers la stimulation de la demande. Activites: (i) Appuyer la planification et la conception de services et des interventions de participation communautaire de qualite utilisant l'approche centree sur l'utilisateur (assistance technique dans le renforcement de capacites, la realisation de la recherche et le developpement du plan) dans chacune des 8 grandes villes; (ii) Appuyer la mise en place d'un systeme d'ecoute sociale continu pour la gestion des rumeurs, desinformations sur la vaccination y compris COVID-19 dans 7 grandes villes; (iii) Realiser une cartographie des ONG, OSC, autres associations engagees dans la promotion de la demande en vaccination et SMNI; (iv) Appuyer l'evaluation et l'identification des approches les plus pertinentes et efficaces pour s'attaquer aux obstacles de genre a la vaccination (v) Appuyer la revue externe du PEV sur la composante communication

title.narrative: WHO : Service Delivery
Service delivery approach suitable to reach missed communities & defualtd from immunizaiton identified and endorsed

target.value: Support all districts in developing or updating their EPI annual operational work plan that is informed by the equity analysis with strategies of Reach Every Community appraoch to guide standard operations (including addressing of MOV; prioritize Zero dose, undervaccinated, marginalized populations and urban Immunization ) using the different Immunization assesment results (eg MOV, Urban immunization assesment, coverage survey etc...)

title.narrative: Dalberg Global Development Advisors : Programme Management - LMC

The MP will provide a status update and course correction measures for H1, H2 and H3 objectives, as per the institutional development plan. He/She will drive the EPI management and team towards achieving H4 milestones.

target.value: Implementing the recommendations suggested in the report: "Evaluation du PEV Madagascar (GAVI/Dalberg)", beyond the aforementioned tasks.
Implementing the recommendations suggested in the report: "Evaluation du PEV Madagascar (GAVI/Dalberg)", beyond the aforementioned tasks.

title.narrative: A framework will be co-created with the EPI team at the central level to monitor the respect of the standard operating procedures. The relevant EPI personnel will be empowered and coached to start the monitoring and enforcement of EPI SOPs at the subnational level.
Marked improvement in team effectiveness and efficiency is demonstrated through assessment of metrics defined during the initial assessment. Ongoing training coaching and mentoring of EPI personnel.

target.value: Develop modern human resources management and instill a results and performance-driven culture aligned with the Ministry of Health (MoH) HR regulations and with best practices on performance incentives.

Develop modern human resources management and instill a results and performance-driven culture aligned with the Ministry of Health (MoH) HR regulations and with best practices on performance incentives.

title.narrative: Marked improvement in team effectiveness and efficiency is demonstrated through assessment of metrics defined during the initial assessment. Ongoing training, coaching and mentoring of EPI personnel at the subnational level.

target.value: Develop modern human resources management practices and instill a results and performance-driven culture aligned with the central level and with best practices on performance incentives.
Develop modern human resources management practices and instill a results and performance-driven culture aligned with the central level and with best practices on performance incentives.

title.narrative: These champions will have demonstrated a strong impact on the EPI which will be reflected in the delivery of the immunization program and the overall engagement of the EPI team and associated partners.

target.value: Identify champions amongst the extended immunisation teams to groom them for peer-leadership and ensure overall strengthening of the EPI.
Identify champions amongst the extended immunisation teams to groom them for peer-leadership and ensure overall strengthening of the EPI.

title.narrative: The capacity building plan in all selected departments is implemented through training sessions and/or coaching. The M&E framework of department-level activities is fully operational, and reports are produced quarterly on department operations performance.

target.value: Strengthen coordination and communication between the EPI at the central level and program managers in the DDS (Sanitation Departments), with particular attention to the less efficient DDS.
Strengthen coordination and communication between the EPI at the central level and program managers in the DDS (Sanitation Departments), with particular attention to the less efficient DDS.

title.narrative: The EPI team is fully able to independently track, monitor, provide timely corrective actions, evaluate and report on programme delivery. The EPI leadership is able to present and leverage program delivery results to lobby for fundraising. Data-backed analyses stemming from EPI dashboards will be used routinely in MOH meetings to create a culture of advocacy and resource mobilization based on data.

target.value: Strengthen the capacity of the EPI?s leadership in program management, and provide them with the appropriate management approaches, techniques and tools.
Strengthen the capacity of the EPI?s leadership in program management, and provide them with the appropriate management approaches, techniques and tools.

title.narrative: The selected district teams are fully able to independently track, monitor, provide timely corrective actions, evaluate and report on programme delivery. The subnational level leadership is able to present and leverage program delivery results to lobby at the central level for fundraising. Data-backed analyses stemming from EPI dashboards will be used routinely in regional meetings to create a culture of advocacy and resource mobilization based on data.

target.value: Strengthen the capacity of the selected districts in program management, planning, provide them with the appropriate management approaches, techniques and tools.
Strengthen the capacity of the selected districts in program management, planning, provide them with the appropriate management approaches, techniques and tools.

title.narrative: The MP will support the EPI Director in managing her relations with the main partners of the EPI, on an ad hoc basis.

target.value: Support the coordination forum through adequate organisatonal, and reporting tools.
Support the coordination forum through adequate organisatonal, and reporting tools.

title.narrative: The MP will support the management team at the regional level to make informed decisions based on the relevant data collected and share key findings with the central level.

target.value: Support the coordination forum through adequate reporting tools and relevant data.
Support the coordination forum through adequate reporting tools and relevant data.

title.narrative: Based on the initial evaluation of the new SOPs, adjustments will be proposed if needed. A continuous improvement framework will be designed and shared with the EPI management and relevant personnel.

target.value: Support the organizational improvement of the EPI at the subnational level by implementing procedures developed by the MP at the central level. The manual of procedures will codify strategic objectives and program management procedures and will play a pivotal role in ensuring the efficiency and effectiveness of the teams.

Support the organizational improvement of the EPI at the subnational level by implementing procedures developed by the MP at the central level. The manual of procedures will codify strategic objectives and program management procedures and will play a pivotal role in ensuring the efficiency and effectiveness of the teams.

Support the organizational improvement of the EPI by developing a manual of procedures. The manual of procedures will codify strategic objectives and program management procedures and will play a pivotal role in ensuring the efficiency and effectiveness of the teams.

Support the organizational improvement of the EPI by developing a manual of procedures. The manual of procedures will codify strategic objectives and program management procedures and will play a pivotal role in ensuring the efficiency and effectiveness of the teams.

title.narrative: A framework will be co-created with the EPI team to monitor the respect of the standard operating procedures. The relevant EPI personnel will be empowered and coached to start the monitoring and enforcement of EPI SOPs. A survey will be developed to assess whether the new procedures meet their intended purpose in inducing higher EPI performance and greater ease of collaboration (internal and external survey).

The MP will develop a training plan for the staff in charge of monitoring and evaluation and surveillance at the operational level and will establish a results-oriented culture within the EPI (central and operational levels) that takes into account collective and individual performance.

The MP will develop a training plan for the staff in charge of monitoring and evaluation and surveillance at the subnational level and establish a results-oriented culture that takes into account collective and individual performance.
The MP will ensure implementation of the capacity building plan for the selected regions. An M&E framework will be designed to monitor the performance of department-level operations fully.

The MP will provide a status update and course correction measures for H1 and H2 objectives, as per the institutional development plan. He/She will drive the EPI management and team towards achieving H3 milestones.

The MP will provide ad-hoc support for documentation required for new coordination mechanisms and follow up activities. The MP will conduct a satisfaction survey of the reliability of data collected at the subational level and make proposals to introduce improvements or corrective measures.

The MP will provide ad-hoc support on the documentation for the forum coordination and follow-up activities. The MP will conduct a satisfaction survey of the EPI activities among its main FTPs and propose improvements or corrective measures.

The leadership of the EPI management team at he subnational level will be assessed by the MP based on the EPI performance improvement in the selected districts, and identify managerial expertise gaps that will serve as themes for ongoing training and coaching sessions.

The leadership of the EPI will be assessed by the MP based on the EPI's performance improvement plan, and identify managerial expertise gaps (at individual and institutional levels) that will serve as themes for ongoing training and coaching sessions.
These staff members will be given tailor-made coaching by professionals to support them in reaching their full leadership potential.
